Posts.Content: Apr 29, 2010 12:46PM lunaselena wrote: I didn't get any facial hair during chemo, but I've been on and off steroids (dexamethasone first, and now prednisone) since October and not only do I have fine hairs on my face, I have them everywhere! Arms, legs, scalp, toes and fingers. Probably my butt and my back too, but since I can't see them, I'm so not worried about it. My main issue is the the thick black hair growing on my face giving me a mustache and the beginnings of a beard. I'm in getting waxed every 3 weeks!
Posts.Title: Facial hair??? kelgrover Titan
